name: dep-scanner
description: Inspired by @burakeregar (https://x.com/burakeregar/status/2014696329549648137). Scans project dependencies for known vulnerabilities (CVEs). Runs npm audit, pip-audit, and similar tools to identify outdated or insecure packages.

repo_url.description: URL of the git repository to scan (use this OR path)

path.description: Local directory path to scan (use this OR repo_url)

package_managers.description: Package managers to scan (auto-detected if not specified)

severity_threshold.description: Minimum severity to include in results
